title: NIT Calicut Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Project Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Calicut (NIT Calicut) has declared the official notification for 2025. Allotted various vacancies for Project Assistant Positions. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Calicut Recruitment 2025 . Here, we provided more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candida...
